See also: karte, kartē, kārtē, kārte, and kartë

German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Karte
Wikipedia de

Alternative forms[edit]

  • Charte, Carte (obsolete)

Etymology[edit]

Ultimately from Latin charta.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈkaʁtə/ (standard)
  • IPA(key): /ˈkaːtə/ (widespread, esp. northern and central Germany)
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Karte f (genitive Karte, plural Karten, diminutive Kärtchen n)

  1. card
  2. map, chart
  3. ticket
